import React, { Component } from 'react' import Stepper from '@/components/stepper' import WrapComponents from '@/components/wrapper' import { SmallHeading } from '@/components/headings' import { ColoredButtons, TransparentButtons } from '@/components/button' import CodeCompaign from '../codeEditor' import HtmlTemplate from '../codeEditor/template' import DesignCampaign from '../DesignCampaign' import ConnectComponent from '../../../../connect' import { GetCampaign, SaveStep2 } from '@/actions/CreateCampaign/emailCampaign' class StepTwo extends Component { state = { steps: ['Channel', 'Message', 'Scheduling', 'Segmentation', 'Overview & Send'], html: true, content: false, senderError: '', senderEmailId: '', replyToEmailId: '', title: '', senderName: '', templatePath: '', htmlTemplate: HtmlTemplate, } componentWillMount() { const { params: { campaign_id }, } = this.props.match this.setState({ campaign_id, }) console.log(this.props.match, 'match props') if (!this.props.CreateCampaign.data) { GetCampaign(campaign_id) } } handleInputFields(key, value) { this.setState({ [key]: value, }) } handleContinue = () => { const { steps, html, content, senderError, ...rest } = this.state SaveStep2({ ...rest, next: 'step-3' }) } render() { const { steps, html, content, title, senderName, replyToEmailId, senderEmailId, htmlTemplate, } = this.state return (
Compose Email
Email Subject
this.handleInputFields('title', e.target.value)} />
Sender Name
this.handleInputFields('senderName', e.target.value)} />
"From" email address
this.handleInputFields('senderEmailId', e.target.value) } />
"Reply-to" email address
this.handleInputFields('replyToEmailId', e.target.value) } />
this.setState({ content: !content, html: !html })} > Design Campaign
this.setState({ content: !content, html: !html })} > Code Campaign
{html ? (
this.setState({ htmlTemplate })} />
) : (
)}
Continue {/* Save Template */} this.props.history.goBack()} className="float grey-border" > Go Back ) } } export default ConnectComponent(StepTwo)
